title: Gucci Mini GG Marmont Belt Bag All Black
description: Gucci mini GG Marmont belt bag in black chevron quilted leather. Featuring black-toned hardware, double G hardware logo at front and a chain link strap with GG clasp. The snap button closure on flap opens to a beige microfibre interior. Approximate dimensions: 16.5cm(L) x 10cm(H) x 5cm(D), strap drop 30cm. Accompanied by Gucci information book, dustbag and box. With Entrupy Certificate of Authenticity. (Pre-owned).
